workoutSettingsDescription: Preferences related to workouts, like parameters and units.
systemDescription: Install app, reset all, telemetry preferences and contact.
installDescription: Install WeightLog as a phone app
noYoutube: This exercise does not have Youtube videos
noPicture: This exercise does not have picture

backup.title: Backup & Import
backup.description: Backup your training data or import data into the app
backup.importing: Importing. Please do not leave the page
backup.importSuccess: Import has been completed. WeightLog will restart now.

errors.pleaseValidYoutubeUrl: Please provide a valid Youtube URL
errors.invalidJSON: This backup file is not valid

useCheckboxes: Use the checkboxes to select the parameters you wish to input during workouts.

confirmDeleteWorkout.title: Delete workout
confirmDeleteWorkout.message: The workout will be removed from the workout plan, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteWorkoutExercise.title: Delete workout exercise
confirmDeleteWorkoutExercise.message: The exercise will be removed from the workout, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteExercise.title: Delete exercise
confirmDeleteExercise.message: The exercise will be hidden from the database, but it will still be visible in the history and any workouts that include it.

confirmDeleteSet.title: Delete set
confirmDeleteSet.message: The set will be removed from the workout, but any existing workout history entries will be kept until you delete them.

confirmDeleteSetHistory.title: Delete set from history
confirmDeleteSetHistory.message: This entry will be permanently removed from the history.

confirmDeletePlan.title: Delete plan
confirmDeletePlan.message: The plan will be deleted, but the history entries will be preserved.

enterNewPlanName: Enter the name for the new plan:
enterPlanNewName: Enter a new name for this plan:
welcomeToWeightLog: Welcome to WeightLog! Be aware this app is in testing and may present errors. We await your feedback!
importWillReplaceEverything: ALL the application data will be DELETED and then the backup will be imported replacing EVERYTHING. This operation cannot be rolled back. Continue?
resetAllWarning: ALL application data will be reset. Make sure you made a backup before proceeding. Other accounts will not be affected. Are you sure you want to continue?
resetAllWarning2: Last warning: ALL application data will be RESET! Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteAllWarning: ALL application data will be reset AND your user account will be deleted. Make sure you made a backup before proceeding. Other accounts will not be affected. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteAllWarning2: Last warning: ALL application data will be RESET and your user account will be deleted! Are you sure you want to continue?
telemetryDescription: Control your preferences on error reporting
telemetry2: When you use WeightLog, we collect some performance data around your session (browser, IP address, URL and some of your actions). When the app crashes, this information is collected into an error report we can use to investigate issues in the app.
telemetry3: NONE of your personal data is collected and the data we keep cannot identify you. This information is needed for us to debug errors proactively to give you the best experience.
telemetry4: The information is processed by Sentry (sentry.io). NO tracking is performed in our product. We serve no ads and thus the data we collect is strictly for technical purposes only.
telemetry5: We encourage users to keep telemetry on, since this will allow us to improve the product and fix the issues you encounter, but we understand some users might not be keen to sharing this data with us and hence we offer you to disable telemetry through this option.
weightlogWillRestart: If you change this preference, WeightLog will restart
reloadDescription: Sometimes Weightlog might get stuck, reloading the page could fix the issues.
autoStopDescription: Stop and save a workout automatically if it's been unchanged for one hour

login.enterNewUsername: Enter the name of the new account

notImplemented.title: Not implemented
notImplemented.description: Sorry, this feature is still in development. Come back soon to try it out!

csvImportDisclaimer: The CSV import feature is written to support importing workouts from another app. This should be a one way process. It is not complete and may not be reliable, so use a JSON file where possible. You will have to check the workouts to ensure everything is alright, since this is a best-effort process.
noHistoryEntries: There are no entries in the history for the selected day

metrics.title: Body measurements
metrics.saveNewValues: Save the measures from this dialog

notApplicableForThis: No data or not appliable for this exercise
notes: Type notes here or click the icon to add an emoji
reactionEmojisDescription: Choose the default emotes to show in the notes section
feedbackDescription: Send us a bug report or comments to improve our app

login.logged_in: You are now logged into WeightCloud as {{user}}
login.logged_out: You've sucessfully logged out from WeightCloud
login.synced: You are in sync with WeightCloud

weightcloud.alpha: WeightCloud is under testing and it's only available for selected users. If you want to participate in our tests, please reach out to us.
